name: Hide Create Empty Project
description: Hides the "Empty project" option when creating/requesting a new project so users must use a template (or ODM XML upload). You can also configure the name of a User Role from your project templates into which the creating/requesting user will be added (Nb. you must configure the module with "Enable module on all projects by default").

system-settings.name: Name of User Role to which creator/requestor will be assigned (if present in template)
